Lyric:
[00:00.56]Once upon a time a few mistakes ago

[00:04.04]I was in your sights, you got me alone

[00:07.52]You found me, you found me, you found me

[00:14.32]I guess you didn't care, and I guess I liked that

[00:17.71]And when I fell hard you took a step back

[00:21.18]Without me, without me, without me

[00:29.27]And he's long gone when he's next to me

[00:36.10]And I realize the blame is on me

[00:41.66]'Cause I knew you were trouble when you walked in

[00:46.73]So shame on me now

[00:49.20]Flew me to places I'd never been

[00:53.36]'Til you put me down, oh

[00:55.60]I knew you were trouble when you walked in

[01:00.40]So shame on me now

[01:02.47]
[01:02.98]Flew me to places I'd never been

[01:07.10]Now I'm lying on the cold hard ground

[01:10.12]Oh, oh, trouble, trouble, trouble

[01:17.00]Oh, oh, trouble,

[01:23.04]No apologies. He'll never see you cry,

[01:26.21]Pretends he doesn't know that he's the reason why.

[01:29.90]You're drowning, you're drowning, you're drowning.

[01:36.52]I heard you moved on

[01:38.28]from whispers on the street

[01:40.04]A new notch in your belt is all I'll ever be

[01:43.39]And now I see, now I see, now I see

[01:51.46]He was long gone when he met me

[01:58.36]And I realize the joke is on me, yeah!
